unittitle_ssm: Daniel M.C. Hopping collection of Long Island Historical Society photographs and slides
abstract_ssm: Included in the collection are four black-and-white photographic prints documenting activities related to the Century Ball, a dinner that was held at the Brooklyn Savings Bank in Brooklyn Heights in commemoration of the 100th anniversary of the establishment of the Long Island Historical Society.
